About Me

Iâ€™m Vance and I love to solve problems. I crave new companies, new technologies, new ideas, and obstacles that resist typical solutions.

I have a liberal arts background and was a doing analytics for a SaaS startup before deciding I wanted to go into software development. As a developer I work primarily in Ruby on Rails and frontend web technologies. To see how I work, check out my playbook.

Some of my favorite tools and background:

  • Web Frameworks: Ruby on Rails, Sinatra
